name: ART7 for Playdate - DEMO
description:
ART7 is a virtual Art Gallery for the Playdate Handheld Console. You can check out the Demo now and run it in the Playdate Simulator included in the Playdate Developer SDK 

This is the Demo! Anyone who donates will receive the full gallery on release. ART7 will also be available to the dev community and is functionally finished. Right now we are in the process of taking in art submissions! Please reach out to us, if you would like to be included. @ledbetter in the Playdate Squad Discord

More info on the Forum & at LDBR.art

***This project is inspired by a similar gallery out of the Gameboy Camera Community from Cat Graffam (@catgraffam) / Twitter I got their demo on itch and am super excited for the full release!
